content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I think 800 Euros per month would be a fair price for the apartment. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get a higher price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Would you consider 850 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price can be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt. How about 900 Euros per month? This is a newly built apartment, and the location is excellent. It's close to all important facilities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price can be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mister Schmidt. Would 950 Euros per month be more acceptable? The apartment is unfurnished, but it's in the city center, which is a great advantage.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price can be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 1000 Euros per month? This is a competitive price for a one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I think the price can be higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
